characters: Driver of a white sedan, truck driver, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving slowly. A truck is parked on the left side of the road, and a cyclist is on the right side, moving towards the road. The cyclist appears to be preparing to cross the road, potentially causing a dangerous situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the cyclist on the right side, who is moving towards the road, potentially requiring the vehicle to decelerate or stop.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Left side: A truck, approximately 5 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 3) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 3 meters away, moving towards the road, potentially crossing.
